name: Add-on Popularity
query:
SELECT
    a.name AS `add_on`,
    COUNT(addon.item) AS `sold_count`
FROM
    `tabAirplane Ticket` AS ta
JOIN
    `tabAirplane Ticket Add-on Item` AS addon ON ta.name = addon.parent
JOIN
    `tabAirplane Ticket Add-on Type` AS a ON addon.item = a.name
GROUP BY
    a.name
ORDER BY
    `sold_count` DESC;
